sentences.en: " Better send him to Bellevue, " he recommended. " He's got pneumonia. "
sentences.cn: “ 最好送他去贝列佛医院, " 他建议道, " 他得了肺炎.

sentences.en: Cage was struck with pneumonia in her youth.
He came down with pneumonia last week.
sentences.cn: 上星期,他得肺炎病倒了.

sentences.en: I had a bad attack of pneumonia and spent two days in hospital on a drip.
sentences.cn: 我得了严重的肺炎，在医院输了两天液。

sentences.en: In November 1941 Payne was seriously ill with pneumonia.
Most people do not have to be hospitalized for asthma or pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 大多数哮喘或肺炎患者无需住院。

sentences.en: Penicillin cured him of his pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 青霉素治好了他的肺炎.

sentences.en: Pneumonia carried him off last week.
sentences.cn: 肺炎上星期夺去了他的生命.

sentences.en: She had feared she was going down with pneumonia or bronchitis.
sentences.cn: 她担心会得肺炎或支气管炎。

sentences.en: She was taken to hospital, suffering from pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 她得了肺炎，被送往医院。

sentences.en: The doctor diagnosed the illness as pneumonia.
The doctor has cured her of pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 大夫把她的肺炎看好了.

sentences.en: The new drug lessens the severity of pneumonia episodes.
sentences.cn: 新药减轻了肺炎发作时的痛苦。

sentences.en: The patient caught pneumonia and went out shortly before midnight.
sentences.cn: 那个病人感染了肺炎,在午夜前不久去世了.

sentences.en: This was a light epidemic of flu and there was no danger if you avoided pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 这是轻度流感,只要当心不引起肺炎,就无危险.
